room_cell.name: Cell
room_cell.story: ...You wake up on a cold cell floor. When you're trying to stand up you feel an intense pain at the back of your head.it feels like someone hit you with an enormous blunt object. After a while you feel strong enough to endure the pain and stand up.

room_warden_hall.name: The warden hall
room_warden_hall.story: You enter the warden hall and see it's completely empty. I better find something to defend myself and get the hell out of here before someone gets back. So my escape goes unnoticed
room_warden_hall.description: You are in the wardens hall.

room_secret_passage.name: Secret passage
room_secret_passage.story: A secret passage, The castle probably has quite a bit of these. I wonder where this one will lead to.
room_secret_passage.description: you are in the secret passage

room_storage_room.name: Storage room
room_storage_room.story: Apparently the rats aren't the only ones who are hungry in this kingdom. It seems there isn't much left to store besides some old gear.
room_storage_room.description: you are in the wardens storage room

room_courtyard.name: The courtyard
room_courtyard.story: What the hell happened here? You look around and see the courtyard has turned into a massacre, bodies everywhere but not all of them are human. I should take a closer look

room_gardens.name: The gardens
room_gardens.story: Well They sure are ruthless, They don't allow anyone to escape. Good thing I came prepared, let's look around to see what happened here.

room_entrance_hall.name: The entrance hall
room_entrance_hall.story: The goblins sure brought some muscle with these guys, I hope there's not many of the left.
room_entrance_hall.description: You are in the entrance hall

room_great_hall.name: The great hall
room_great_hall.story: You enter the great hall and see the guards who where off duty were killed as well. there are no weapons with them, they must have been caught by surprise.
room_great_hall.description: You are in the Great hall

room_kitchens.name: The kitchens
room_kitchens.story: These guys must have been on guard duty good thing I made quick work of them. Let's see if we can snatch something tasteful here.

room_staircase_tower.name: The staircase tower
room_staircase_tower.story: The staircase seems deserted, I should make haste but which side do I go?
room_staircase_tower.description: You are in the staircase tower

room_west_wing.name: The west wing
room_west_wing.story: I guess these two were too scared to take on the wizard by themselves and tried to flee. However I happened to be in the way.
room_west_wing.description: You are in the west wing

room_wizard_tower.name: The wizard tower
room_wizard_tower.story: You enter the wizard tower and see a magical chest floating in the middle of the room. This is probably what the scroll meant.
room_wizard_tower.description: you are in the wizard tower

room_east_wing.name: The east wing
room_east_wing.story: They keep getting stronger and stronger, I wonder what foes lay ahead but I can't falter now I am so close.
room_east_wing.description: You are in the east wing

room_royal_quarters.name: The royal quarters
room_royal_quarters.story: The King's room is just up ahead, I am almost there. I hope I can make it in time.
room_royal_quarters.description: you are in the royal quarters

room_kings_room.name: The king's room
room_kings_room.story: It seems I was too late to rescue him. He wasn't a good king, maybe this kingdom can change now.
room_kings_room.description: you are in the kings room
